sentences.en: Betty is a disagreeable girl; she quarrels with everyone.
sentences.cn: 贝蒂是个脾气很坏的姑娘, 见了谁都会争吵.
对我来说,一切看着都不顺眼.

sentences.en: Halliday's comments grew daily more and more sparklingly disagreeable and disparaging.
sentences.cn: 一天天过去,哈里代的评论越来越肆无忌惮,越来越讨人嫌,越来越阴损了.

sentences.en: He found it hard to reconcile himself to the disagreeable state.
sentences.cn: 他发现难以忍受这种不愉快的状况.
他是个难以相处的家伙.
他是个肤浅、难相处的人。

sentences.en: His clothes felt disagreeable, his hair bad.
sentences.cn: 他觉得自己衣衫不整, 头发凌乱.

sentences.en: I suppose that's why you're more than usually disagreeable on Monday.
sentences.cn: 我说哩,恐怕这就是为什么星期一你的脾气比平常更坏的原因吧?

sentences.en: I'm afraid it will be too disagreeable to you.
sentences.cn: 我怕这会使你太为难的.

sentences.en: If speech was so disagreeable it must obviously be her duty.
sentences.cn: 即使要说的话是这样不合心意,也显然还是她的义务.

sentences.en: It was disagreeable -- miserably disagreeable -- in all its phases.
sentences.cn: 无论从哪方面说,这 活儿 都是令人讨厌的,十分令人讨厌的.

sentences.en: On the whole, he rather enjoyed having to be so disagreeable.
sentences.cn: 总的来说, 他现在以待人冷淡生硬为乐事.

sentences.en: She could be wayward, petulant, and disagreeable.
sentences.cn: 她有时也会任性 、 脾气很坏 、 很暴躁.

sentences.en: The washrooms were disagreeable , crude , if not foul places , and the whole atmosphere was sordid.
sentences.cn: 洗手间即使不算肮脏,也是粗陋不堪, 空气污秽恶劣.

sentences.en: Tito felt a disagreeable chill at this answer.
sentences.cn: 听见这样的答复,蒂托感到一阵不愉快的寒意.

words.tran_cn: 不同意；不一致；争执；不适宜

trans.tran_cn: <正> 不合意的，令人不快的，讨厌的，（人）不友善的
trans.tran_en: not at all enjoyable or pleasant
